nodes.bodyText: I think we should either mark the double... as @Nullable or drop the @Nullable from the return type annotation. Or we could actually leave the code as it was here, or return Collections.emptyList().
yeah, we're already guarding all the calls so they don't pass in null here, so I think we can just return emptyList if someone figures out a way around it.
Agree it's hard enough to pass null so anything is fine including empty list.

Actually I went with null (and added @Nullable) to the parameter. Otherwise the repeated values would have different behavior on null vs the singular values, didn't see a good enough reason to do that.
